location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘No.1. Bedouin tent showing guest compartment on right.’

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:This black and white photograph shows a Bedouin tent in Kuwait, with a man standing in the sand in the foreground in front of the tent, a sheep to the left behind the man, a boy to the right behind the man, and the man’s wife behind the boy. The compartment on the right of the tent is the men’s compartment and guest chamber.Inscriptions:Printed label on the reverse of the image: ‘No.1. Bedouin tent showing guest compartment on right.’
